title: NCLAT upholds tribunal’s order of Sarda Energy’s acquisition of SKS Power Generation
description: The NCLAT has upheld the approval of SKS Power Generation's acquisition by Sarda Energy & Minerals Ltd, despite challenges from unsuccessful bidders. The decision underscores the importance of transparency in the IBC framework and highlights the timely resolution and maximization of asset value.
